duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for budget monitoring and enforcement of construction quality.
Monitoring, observing, and reporting on safety issues of the project site.
Prepares monthly contract status reports, budget reviews, amendment requests, and negotiations.
Coordinates personnel and construction activities with other Construction Managers throughout the company.
Preparing and participating in interviews, developing portions of proposals, and preparing meeting agendas.
Identifying potential projects, writing proposals, making presentations, drafting letters, and participating in interviews.
Mentoring and training Mid-Level Resident Engineers. Report and letter writing.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or Professional Engineer Certification
